article_title: U.S. Stocks Rise Amid Health-Care Rebound
article_text:
A rebound in shares of health-care companies propelled U.S. stocks higher.

The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 122.10 points, or 0.7%, to 16912.29.

The S&P 500 advanced 15.91 points, or 0.8%, to 1995.83, and the Nasdaq Composite gained 42.79 points, or 0.9%, 4791.15.

Health-care stocks in the S&P 500 rose 1.5% after a...

Health-care stocks in the S&P 500 rose 1.5% after a...
A rebound in shares of health-care companies propelled U.S. stocks higher.
The S&P 500 advanced 15.91 points, or 0.8%, to 1995.83, and the Nasdaq Composite gained 42.79 points, or 0.9%, 4791.15.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 122.10 points, or 0.7%, to 16912.29.
